db:abstract.db:para: The Spin Box Delegate example shows how to create an editor for a custom delegate in the model/view framework by reusing a standard Qt editor widget.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS = delegate.h SOURCES = delegate.cpp \ main.cpp
